entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-03-22
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [cdac] data contract spec follow up items and open questions #100162
  • Support exporting STJ serialization contracts to JSON schema #100159
    9.0.0
  • Failure in GC\API\NoGCRegion\Callback_Svr\Callback_Svr.cmd #100149
    9.0.0
  • Add a STJ feature flag recognizing nullable reference type annotations on properties #100144
    9.0.0
  • How to release dll load by mono? #100136
  • IOException when creating a global mutex on macOS #100135
  • Cannot reading certificates from MAUI App on Mac OS #100133
  • Assertion failed 'lastBlockILEndOffset < beginOffs' #100125
    9.0.0
  • HTTPClient is not reusing the SSL/TLS1.2 session and does handshake on every request #100119
  • profiler\multiple test failed #100114
  • [API Proposal]: ReadOnlySet<T> #100113
    9.0.0
  • WASM test failing with OOM #100111
  • Unable to use Process.Start() in Mac Catalyst Universal application in Release configuration #100129

Closed

  • `ilverify` not installed as `dotnet-ilverify` #100069
  • Question: does compiler keep names of static classes and static functions compiled with NativeAOT #100166
  • HttpConnectionPool contention for HTTP/1.1 #70098
    9.0.0
  • System.Net.Quic.QuicException : Connection aborted by peer (987) #100150
  • [browser][mt] AsyncTransactionScopeTests.VerifyBYOTSyncTSNestedAsync - Value is not null #97513
    9.0.0
  • Fail null deserialization on non-nullable reference types #1256
    9.0.0
  • build.cmd fails to pick the right MSVC toolset on `1es-windows-2022-open` #100046
  • [NativeAOT/arm32] Crash in write barrier early during startup #100112
  • [browser][mt] TCValidateAfterAddInvalidSchema.AddValid_Import_Include_Redefine #75132
    9.0.0
  • [MT][browser] `System.Threading.Tasks.Tests.TaskContinueWhenAnyTests.RunContinueWhenAnyTests` fails #91550
    9.0.0
  • WasmTestOnBrowser-System.Threading.Tests' END OF WORK ITEM LOG: Command timed out, and was killed #98195
    9.0.0
  • Error: Assert failed: Expected Promise for GCHandle #98721
    9.0.0
  • WasmTestOnBrowser-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript.Tests time out #97112
    9.0.0
  • [browser] FATAL UNHANDLED EXCEPTION #98842
    9.0.0
  • [browser][MT] WebSocket is already in CLOSING or CLOSED state #97260
    9.0.0
  • Problem with DTR, RTS, CTS, RI signals. #100126
  • System.Net.Quic.QuicException : Connection aborted by peer #100121
  • Remove trim warnings from ComponentModel APIs that take Type as a parameter #97841
  • AssemblyLoadConext dident be collected after unloaded in mono runtime #100124
  • Provide a method to send PosixSignal to the Process. #99506
  • SequenceReader, TryReadLittleEndian analyzer error issue #94172

PullRequests

Created

  • Disable nogcregion #100167
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Clear m_nodeToLoopMemoryBlockMap when preparing to repeat optimizations #100164
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix unbound MAC work in GetCertContentType #100163
    area-System.Security
  • Prevent hoisting nodes with order side effects #100160
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Optimize Guid's GreaterThan operator to use 64bit compare. #100158
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution
  • [mono] Optimize (typedef|table|declsec)_locator metadata loading #100157
    area-VM-meta-mono, runtime-mono
  • [browser][MT] disable jiterp #100156
    arch-wasm, area-VM-threading-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • Add JitOptRepeat configuration options #100154
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT ARM64-SVE: Remove ldr/str stack var tests (#100101) #100153
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • JIT: Set `bbCodeOffsEnd` to BAD_IL_OFFSET when expanding static init calls #100152
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [browser][MT] handle exceptions #100148
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • [release/9.0-preview3] Revert #99140 #100147
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Update CodeAnalysis config to include recently-added rules #100146
    area-Meta
  • [HttpStress] [SslStress] Workaround image bug in 1es-windows-2022-open #100145
    area-System.Net, 9.0.0
  • Revert #99140 #100143
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [browser] load core assemblies first #100141
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • JIT: Add a uniform representation for parameter ABI information #100138
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT ARM64-SVE: Add Sve.Abs() and Sve.Add() #100134
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, arch-arm64-sve
  • [release/8.0-staging] Fix #91958: use mach_timebase_info to determine process time coefficient on macOS #100122
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Diagnostics.Process, os-mac-os-x, 8.0.x
  • Remove more Helper Method Frames #100116
    area-VM-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Remove various single-scenario YAML parameters in our build scripts and shift implementation responsibility to those scenarios #100115
    area-Infrastructure

Merged

  • Fix ILVerify usage doc #100118
    area-Tools-ILVerification
  • Update codeowners #100165
    area-Meta
  • Fix RhpLockCmpXchg64 FCall on win-x86 #100155
    arch-x86, community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Unify formatting part of BigInteger of CoreLib #97889
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • Enable constant CSE for ARM #100054
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [mono] Update runtime docs. #99699
    documentation, area-Build-mono
  • [mono] Add old design docs from mono website. #99755
    documentation, area-VM-meta-mono, runtime-mono
  • Add JIT debugging helpers, and other debugging output improvements #100123
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Improve the throughput of SocketsHttpHandler's HTTP/1.1 connection pool #99364
    area-System.Net.Http, 9.0.0
  • [release/9.0-preview3] Update syntax for PC relative offsets in ARM assembly #100151
    Servicing-approved, area-VM-coreclr
  • [MT][browser] AsyncTransactionScopeTests.VerifyBYOTSyncTSNestedAsync passes #100139
    arch-wasm, area-VM-threading-mono, os-browser
  • JIT ARM64-SVE: Add more templated encode immediate methods #100078
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, arch-arm64-sve
  • JIT ARM64-SVE: Remove ldr_mask/str_mask tests (#100101) #100132
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-arm64-sve
  • Fix calculation in PREPARE_EXTERNAL_VAR[_INDIRECT] #100117
    arch-arm32, community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Make IF_SVE_FZ_2A and IF_SVE_HG_2A consistent with similar groups #100089
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-arm64-sve
  • [QUIC] Move 0 byte read before semaphore release #100128
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • [NativeAOT] Move Interlocked null checks to managed, RhpLockCmpXchg64 to C #100021
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Remove s_classificationSizeTable entries which are not used #100097
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Add a note about slow build analysis updates #100092
    area-Infrastructure
  • Convert small atomic fallbacks to managed #99011
    area-System.Threading, community-contribution
  • Change the CryptoKit interop entrypoints to use the Swift calling convention #99970
    area-System.Security

Updated

  • Support setting NamedPipeClientStream.ReadMode with PipeAccessRights ctor overload #100001
    area-System.IO, new-api-needs-documentation, 9.0.0
  • Allow setting ZipArchiveEntry general-purpose flag bits #98278
    area-System.IO.Compression, community-contribution
  • Obsolete invalid AdvSimd.ShiftRightLogicalRoundedNarrowingSaturate* overloads #99985
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, breaking-change, 9.0.0
  • Initial spec for the meaning and relationships between data contracts #99936
    area-Meta
  • Switch to iSimdVector and Align WidenAsciiToUtf16 #99982
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, community-contribution
  • Scalar/Packed conversions for floating point to integer #97529
    breaking-change, area-CodeGen-coreclr, needs-breaking-change-doc-created, community-contribution
  • [wasm] use sbrk instead of emscripten mmap or malloc when loading bytes into heap #100106
    arch-wasm, area-VM-meta-mono
  • Call the Copy Constructor for stack arguments in C++/CLI on x86 #100050
    area-Interop-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Set version in ZIP local header to ZIP64, when the file offset is >4GB #94970
    area-System.IO.Compression, community-contribution
  • Optimize BigInteger.Divide #96895
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • Optimize BigInteger.Parse #97589
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • Simplify BigInteger.Multiply #98587
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • [ILLink] Mark recursive interface implementations in MarkStep #99922
    NO-MERGE, linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • Add additional checks to optimization of constant static field loads #99845
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Make normal statics simpler (DRAFT) #99183
    NO-MERGE, area-VM-coreclr
  • Make delegates immutable #99200
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Initialize values for yield normalization during startup #99991
    area-VM-coreclr
  • JIT: Add support for struct returns from Swift reverse pinvokes #100091
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix JitOptRepeat #94250
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [QUIC] Try every ip address on host connection #99204
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • Add JsonPascalCaseNamingPolicy #100017
    NO-MERGE, area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • JIT: initial work on general count reconstruction #99992
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Enable NativeAOT win-x86 runtime tests #99688
    arch-x86, community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • [browser][MT] Handling blocking wait #99833
    arch-wasm, area-VM-threading-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • Start moving over to official templates #99433
    area-Infrastructure
  • JIT ARM64-SVE: Add templated register encoding methods #100081
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, arch-arm64-sve
  • JIT: temporarily enable RLCSEGreedy to see how it fares in CI #98776
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm] Bump chrome for testing - linux: 123.0.6312.58, windows: 123.0.6312.58 #100084
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • JIT: Remove remaining SVE references from emitarm64.cpp #100100
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, arch-arm64-sve
  • [Ignore] Testing purposes #99467
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • [ci] Fix Playwright test times out/fails because target closed #100074
    NO-MERGE, arch-wasm, area-VM-meta-mono
  • [browser] Revert to full `NativeName` by interop with JS #99956
    arch-wasm, area-System.Globalization, os-browser
  • Implement ARM32 atomic intrinsics #97792
    arch-arm32, area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • TypeName parsing API #100094
    area-System.Reflection.Metadata, new-api-needs-documentation, 9.0.0
  • JIT: Fix LA64 and RISCV64 build errors on Windows #100099
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • LogicalName added for EmbeddedResource #99999
    area-AssemblyLoader-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [IGNORE] Test 1es-windows-2022-open Windows build #100038
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW
  • Seal overridden virtual method `SetDefaultFallbacks` #100030
    area-System.Text.Encoding, community-contribution
  • [release/8.0-staging] [HTTP/2] Fix handling of effectively empty DATA frame (#99502) #99677
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Net.Http, 8.0.x
  • [release/6.0-staging] [HTTP/2] Fix handling of effectively empty DATA frame (#99502) #99678
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Net.Http, 6.0.x
  • [RISC-V] WiP: Simplify flags for passing struct in registers #100080
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • NativeAOT/win-x86: Enable FEATURE_EH_CALLFINALLY_THUNKS #99718
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Implement swift lowering algorithm in Mono's type system #99439
    area-Interop-mono
  • Optimize casts from constant byrefs #99130
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Detect non-core Enums. #100104
    area-System.Reflection, community-contribution
  • Trim unused interfaces #100000
    NO-MERGE, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Rebase the installer build jobs on the global build job template #100110
    area-Infrastructure-installer
  • Vectorized `GetNonRandomizedHashCode` #98838
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-03-22
entry.content:
PullRequests

Created

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Fix a GC hole in the new LSSA implementation #2531

Updated

  • Swift bindings generator with simple parser and emitter #2525
    area-SwiftBindings

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-03-22
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Unable to resolve dotnetcli.blob.core.windows.net (releases-index.json) #39685

Closed

  • "dotnet restore --locked-mode" does not respect global.json #39697
  • Pipeline - Project Requires Installation of .Net Workloads: Maui-Tizen (dotnet core 8.0.203) #39667

PullRequests

Created

  • Ingest new props file from installer and use it to auto-include Toolset Compilers package #39701
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [Wasm] Remove workarounds #39689
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • Migrate to 1ES templates for internal builds #39647
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2412092 #39615
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-03-22
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • [Proposal]: Support default parameter values in lambdas #6051
    12.0
  • Collection expression loophole: ability to invoke .Add() method with the parameter type not matching the collection expression element type #7724
  • Proposal: Semi-Auto-Properties; `field` keyword #140
    Working Set
  • Proposal: "Closed" type hierarchies #485
    Working Set

PullRequests

Updated

  • Add proposal for "ref and unsafe in iterators and async" #7994

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-03-22
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Rename toggle button not shown up in light theme #72681
  • Incorrect "CS8602 Dereference of a possibly null reference" after pattern-matching through a derived type #72680
  • OverFlowOnFluentCall_ExtensionMethods is failing #72678
    17.10
  • Analyzer tearing issues with MSBuild and .NET SDK disagree on compilers #72672
  • Code using collection expression that compiled in .NET 8/.NET 9 preview.1 produces CS9215 in .NET 9 preview.2 #72668
  • IncrementalValuesProvider.GroupBy #72667
  • Calling MSBuildWorkspace.Create() throw exception System.MissingMethodException:“Method not found: 'System.Collections.Immutable.ImmutableArray`1<System.Reflection.Assembly> #72666
  • Test plan for "ref and unsafe in iterators and async" feature #72662
    .NET 9

Closed

  • `SyntaxFacts`'s `GetXXXKinds` methods can return nonexistent syntax kinds #72300
    Backlog
  • Suboptimal code for non-linear is-pattern expressions compared to switch #59615
    17.10
  • Pattern matching causing redundant jumps in generated IL (maybe a bug, maybe a good reason?) #55334
  • region text not updating when collapsed #69296
    17.8 P3
  • ```WellKnownMember.System_String__Format_IFormatProvider``` should actually be a `SpecialMember` #72280
    17.10
  • Add `SpecialType` entry for `ReadOnlySpan` #72102
  • The compiler doesn't flag errors in simple 'using' statements. #72496
    17.10

PullRequests

Created

  • Simplify updating the primary workspace without passing in a version #72688
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Update segmented collections from v5.0.2 reference sources to v8.0.3 #72687
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • generate package for clasp binary to ensure symbols exist #72686
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add Emit3 to `-testCompilerOnly` build flag #72685
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Merge latest bits from `main` branch into extensions branch #72684
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Bind to the background of border #72682
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Needs UX Triage
  • Fix exception for non-cs/vb document #72677
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Update AI rename UI to make suggestion button more button-like #72676
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged, Needs UX Triage
  • Opt into stj serialization on LSPclient #72675
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Disallow dynamic calls on ref struct receivers #72674
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Create stronger type to expression compilation tracker internal policy #72673
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Do not generate obsolete `Exception` constructor #72671
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Remove invisible character in official pipeline yaml #72665
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Allow ref-like locals in iterators and async methods #72664
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Ref/Unsafe in Iterators/Async
  • Remove 'diagnostics cleared' event #72661
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Remove legacy IDiagnosticService #72660
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Forward diagnostic reanalysis request to be a lsp pull diagnostic refresh instead #72659
    Area-IDE, untriaged

Merged

  • Fix indent #72683
    Area-Infrastructure, Community, untriaged, Next
  • Update EOL versions #72623
    Area-Infrastructure, Community, untriaged, Next
  • Skip failing test #72679
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Do not return nonexistent kinds in `SyntaxFacts`' methods #72264
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Add status of feature "ref/unsafe in iterators/async" #72663
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Remove unnecessary string[] allocations #72642
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Emit extensions as plain struct types #72643
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Language Feature - Roles
  • Create API docs feedback template #72670
    Area-Infrastructure, Community, untriaged, Next
  • Avoid creating result temp for is-expressions (follow-up) #72273
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Introduce a concept of internal special types, move all members defined in special types to the SpecialMember set. #72646
    Concept-API, Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Disallow modifiers in local_using_declaration #72589
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next

Updated

  • Remove feature flag option #72689
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Provide option to only update source-generators on special events (like a build) #72494
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Add support for AIOSP to search only the current document or current project. #72293
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Expose a way for Razor to register capabilities into the AlwaysActivateInProcLanguageClient #72609
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.ExternalAccess.VisualDiagnostics #72296
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Fixes for Linux release build #72658
    Area-Infrastructure, Community, untriaged
  • Using Segmented collections to avoid LOH allocations #72656
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Hande error scenarios involving target types and named arguments in nullable walker #72635
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Remove system for dumping text files into memory mapped files. #70160
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Add CreateTokenParser public API #72622
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Avoid creating result temp for switch-expressions #69194
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Handle ref safety of user-defined operators #71911
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Language Feature - Ref Fields
  • Collection expressions: require Add method callable with a single argument for class and struct types that do not use [CollectionBuilder] #72654
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Fix line endings of semantic snippets #71731
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Remove the IBuildOnlyDiagnosticService #72447
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Semantic search #71268
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-03-22
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Don't extend the key ring cache lifetime beyond the default key lifetime #54708
    Backlog
  • OpenIdConnectHandler to support async state data format operations #54704
  • Blazor Question: Order/Index of ChildComponents rendered via ChildContent/RenderFragment #54703
  • Microsoft.Extensions.ApiDescription.Server: Allow specifying --environment #54698
    Backlog
  • DataProtectionProvider persist keys to BLOB does not use keys from BLOB #54697
  • SDK is missing some packages for .NET Framework targets #54696
  • Provide better developer experience when for missing dependencies #54694
  • OutputCache: allow returning cached responses as fully fresh (Date: now, Age: 0) #54687
  • Allow razor components to provide their own default component key #54686
  • Redis distributed cache does not need to use Lua #54685
  • [Blazor] OnKeydown event strange behavior, use enter key to search #54684
  • NavigationManager issue in blazor webAssembly App #54682

Closed

  • Issues with authorization on Blazor WASM #54611
  • File Input in Blazor SSR not validating #54607
  • Blazor WASM with Microsoft Identity Platform within iframes #54665
  • Add Perhaps additional event to the component life cycle for SSR pages #54668
  • TimeSpan shown as object in OpenAPI definition is not compatible with System.Text.Json serialization #54526
  • Questions around PersistentComponentState in Blazor #54633
  • Endpoint metadata added with `.MapXXX().AddYYY()` can't be accessed in `ActionDescriptor` #54594
  • Blazor Wasm, ObjectGraphDataAnnotationsValidator and EditContext.Validate() not working as expected #54683
  • Very slow build - can't build project #54293
  • ASP.NET Core Web App (Model-View-Controller) targeting .NET 8 with Windows Identity Platform fails after user login #51913
  • State management needs to support transition between Server and WebAssembly models in Web Apps #54455
  • NavigationManager.NavigateTo throws exception when navigating in OnInitialized #54436

PullRequests

Created

  • Make types in Microsoft.AspNetCore.DataProtection.KeyManagement.Internal internal #54707
    area-dataprotection
  • Update MSDN URL in OAuthHandler #54691
    community-contribution, area-security
  • Implement Redis distributed cache without Lua #54689
    feature-caching, area-networking

Merged

  • [Infrastructure] Updated npm package cache 2024-03-22 #54702
    area-mvc, 9.0-preview4
  • [Infrastructure] Add a script to update NPM dependencies and create PRs #54701
    area-infrastructure, 9.0-preview4
  • [Infrastructure] Add a workflow to validate package-lock.json when changes are introduced. #54688
    area-infrastructure, 9.0-preview4
  • [main] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `c231e6f` to `eff443c` #54693
    area-infrastructure, 9.0-preview4
  • [Blazor] Update NPM dependencies #54667
    area-infrastructure, 9.0-preview4
  • Fix route analyzer performance with highly concatenated strings #54479
    area-infrastructure, 9.0-preview4

Updated

  • Set correct ProductVersion for productVersion.txt #54710
    area-infrastructure
  • Make the key ring cache expire shortly after an immediately-activated key is generated #54517
    area-dataprotection
  • [release/8.0] Preserve RemoteAuthenticationContext during trimming if used in JS interop #54655
    Servicing-approved, area-blazor, 8.0.5
  • #51611 - Extended Blazor server and webassembly options to match web format. #54649
    area-blazor, community-contribution

entry.title: dotnet/diagnostics - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-03-22
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • dotnet-counters does not report values from multiple Metrics Meters with distinct tags #4564

PullRequests

Updated

  • Update EOL versions #4561

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-03-22
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • CarouselView does not render correctly on orientation change #21401
  • Maui -Android certificate pinning is not kicking in.. but works in ios #21396
  • RelativeLayout renders blank with no visible elements #21395
    Backlog
  • [iOS] UIButton uses deprecated APIs when dealing with the Image #21394
    Backlog
  • NullReferenceException in Android TabbedPageManager #21393
  • IsPlatformEnabled is false for RoundRectangle stroke shape of a Border, hence the layouts that are part of the Microsoft.Maui.Controls.Compatibility and their derivateves are not rendered #21390
  • Memoryleak VisualstateManager in ButtonStyle on Android #21389
    Backlog
  • [Hybrid] Animation lag during 1st render fragment load #21388
  • DynamicResource does not pick up resources added to a page via MergedDictionaries #21387
  • [iOS] CollectionView has inconsistent width calculation between iOS and Android when in a Grid with 'auto' column definition #21385
  • InputTransparent has no effect on Windows #21384
  • CollectionView with ItemSpacing => Infinite layout loop Android #21379
    .NET 8 SR4

Closed

  • SecureStorage.Default.GetAsync not able to retrieve value set on another page. #21361
  • [Android] Exception after changing MainPage on App.xaml.cs from ContentPage to AppShell on runtime. #21257
  • [Android/iOS][NavigationPage] Inheritance of NavigationPage breaks TitleView #21327
  • VS2022 (v 17.9.3) will not hit breakpoints in a Task #21364
  • Maui-8.0.10-preview.10282 Fails AzureDevops looking for system runtime 9.00 #21096
  • MAUI Community Toolkit EventToCommandBehavior Fails to Pass EventArgs Arguments in Versions > 1.0 #21354
  • Keystroke capture support Maui #21397
  • [net9.0] Not able to load net9 branch on VS Internal preview can't build Maps on windows #20753
    .NET 9 Planning
  • Windows/UWP crashes on 8.0.10 #21360
  • Multi Project Template .Net8? #21391
  • Maui for ios RTL modes problem with ScrollView #17674

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-03-22
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • JSON column translation fails when using .Union() #33378
  • How to set comment on JSON column #33375

PullRequests

Merged

  • Update TSA owner and external packages #33380

Updated

  • Fix key generation validation for TPC. #33371

  • Introduce liftable constants to shaper to prepare for precompilation #33351
